Resume

Self-study practices are part of my personal professional development, I have the pleasure of researching, developing and documenting my achievements

CV


Content

My best experience as a professional, and also as a personal one, is to understand that any human being in the right conditions can be able to train in a self-taught way, learn and develop skills to wait if he wants to; And self-motivation is a skill that certainly should not be lacking. The main key to achieve this, and in general for any type of objective, is discipline. Getting it is the most important step, and the next is to maintain it.

And Something Else

Although it sounds trivial, in reality, understanding its importance makes a difference since to achieve it it may be complicated for some and I include myself in this case. But it is possible, since a few years ago when I started my studies in the degree of Chemical Engineering, I could not understand the most basic knowledge of algebra, but my enthusiasm and my interest motivated me to try it, although initially my results were stumbling blocks and exams with rating of zero. Even so, I never backtracked and the end result was my degree in chemical engineering, and almost a degree in mathematics; however, I got a masters degree in mathematical science instead. There is no better proof that almost anything is possible if we start with initiative, and perseverance until we achieve discipline. And of course, we are all interested in knowing what kind of music you listen to. I share my favorite YouTube list, enjoy it!
